Madness {4}{G}{G} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Look at the top eight cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then if this spell was cast for its madness cost, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
